name: Discomobulate
description:
This is a fighting strategy game, where every 10 seconds you have a new round. In each round first second is to decide you fighting strategy and 9 seconds is for fight itself! You have limited stamina, so decide your moves wisely, and ofcourse you can always skip move, in order to save stamina for further.

Disclaimer:

GAME IS HARD. AND USE FULLSCREEN FOR BETTER UI EXPERIENCE.

Controls:

[Shift] - Block

[W] - Punch

[S] - Skip (save stamina)

[Space] - Discomobulate

[R] - Restart

LDJam51 Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/discomobulate

Fixed edition ( updates after jam ): https://oyshoboy.itch.io/discomobulate-fixed-edition
